lead_paragraph: United Arab Emirates playmaker Omar Abdulrahman's disappointment at failing to win the Asian Champions League with Al Ain last weekend was tempered when he was named the continent's best player on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Emirati Abdulrahman Named Asia Player of the Year
headline.main: Emirati Abdulrahman Named Asia Player of the Year

snippet: United Arab Emirates playmaker Omar Abdulrahman's disappointment at failing to win the Asian Champions League with Al Ain last weekend was tempered when he was named the continent's best player on Thursday night....
